com.illcode.meterman.impl

Class Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illcode.meterman.impl.BaseEntity
      • com.illcode.meterman.impl.Container
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity

    public class Container
extends BaseEntity
    This class represents anything that can contain, support, or in a similar way hold a set of entities as contents. It supports being locked and opened with a key.

    Thanks to special support in DarkRoom, unlocked containers in the room (as opposed to in the player's inventory) that contain light sources will propagate light, as it were, into the room. This only works one level deep--a light source in a container inside another container will not propagate light all the way into the room.

    • Field Detail

      • inPrep

        protected String inPrep
        The preposition that will be used when putting something "in/on/etc." this container. Should generally be in lowercase.

      • outPrep

        protected String outPrep
        The preposition that will be used when taking something "out/off/etc." of this container. Should generally be in lowercase.

      • replaceParserMessage

        public String replaceParserMessage(String action)
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Normally the GameManager prints a parser-like message when an action is performed, like "> TAKE CLOAK". An entity can request that this parser message replaced with its own message, or suppressed entirely.
        Specified by:
        replaceParserMessage in interface Entity
        Overrides:
        replaceParserMessage in class BaseEntity
        Parameters:
        action - the action that is being performed
        Returns:
        null to allow the normal parser message flow to continue, "" to suppress the parser message entirely, or a non-empty string to replace the default parser message.
